comment: So smooth and delicious. Bottle is pretty cool
Unlike anything I've had so far (very new to the scene) so not familiar with the notes. Sweet with mild spice?
Aroma is strong raisin and plum. Flavor is sweet with dark fruits. Finish remains sweet with cinnamon and spice.
Nice juicy sweet body. A but shy on the nose.
Smooth and sweet. Smoke on the nose.
